name: Boo
description: The goodest boy.

name: Smith
description: Means well, but is a bit erratic and absent minded. Mostly polite, but if annoyed often unleashes an onslaught of verbal abuse.

name: Villyth Koehlanna
description: A young adult drow, who was born the opposite of their current gender and comes from a disgraced family of scrap collectors. They are likable and judgmental, and have found work as a mechanic.

name: Banana-Gator
description: Formerly Amar Rodan. He was approached by a lizardfolk who magically summoned a banana atop his head. That event forever changed Amar's destiny.

name: Vodos Morskoth
description: A young adult triton, who must read every book they come across and comes from a sleepy harbour town. He is scolding and sentimental, and has found work as a herbalist.

name: Hugolina Miner
description: An adult human, who can't read and comes from a travelling theatre company. She is gregarious and cocky, and has found work as a pickpocket.

name: Filfaere Eathalena
description: A young adult drow, who is a pacifist and comes from a tropical paradise. She is hateful and risk-taking, and has found work as an exorcist.

name: Adrex Nemmonis
description: An adult dragonborn, who was once very wealthy but lost everything and comes from a backwater village. He is sober and miserable, and has found work as a cook.

name: Bartholomew Potter
description: A young adult human, who can't tolerate gluten and comes from a small farm. He is curious and rebellious, and has found work as a chef.

name: Xyrnos
description: A young adult hobgoblin, who keeps a diary of all the creatures they come across and comes from a farming village in a lush forest. He is hostile and joking, and has found work as a gladiator.

name: Ugarth Fisher
description: A young adult halforc, who doesn't trust warforged and comes from a bustling underground city. He is savage and gentle, and has found work as a dancer.

name: Nalos Paroxath
description: An adult triton, who always looks their best and comes from a secret barracks. He is sassy and argumentative, and has found work as a merchant.

name: Korag Mason
description: A young adult halforc, who wears rings, which isn’t cool, but its cool that they don’t care if they’re cool and comes from the inner slums of a large city. He is cheerful and sentimental, and has found work as a builder.

name: Paelias Wright
description: An adult halfelf, who has a drinking problem and comes from a company of mercenaries and sellswords. He is reckless and practical, and has found work as a farmer.

name: Aldous Thatcher
description: An adult human, who blames all their misfortune on ghosts and comes from a farming village in a lush forest. He is hyper and cantankerous, and has found work as a mechanic.

name: Warryn Turen Nim
description: An adult gnome, who distrusts anyone taller than them and comes from an underwater bubble city. He is meddlesome and secretive, and has found work as an executioner.

name: George Carpenter
description: A young adult human, who is secretly a dragon and comes from a peaceful nomadic culture. He is obnoxious and dishonest, and has found work as a knight.

name: Cloud on the Mountaintop (Cloud) Distant Rain
description: An adult tabaxi, who is vegetarian and comes from the inside of an asylum. He is rash and emotional, and has found work as a healer.

name: Ejla
description: An old hobgoblin, who gives their weapons names and comes from a fallen kingdom in the wilds. She is courteous and excited, and has found work as a pirate.

name: Willow
description: A young adult firbolg, who blames all their misfortune on ghosts and comes from a slave market. He is a drunkard and miserable, and has found work as an exorcist.

name: Bethrynna Parker
description: A young adult halfelf, who is the escaped clone of a wealthy politician and comes from a street gang in a large city. She is sexist and preoccupied, and has found work as a pirate.

name: Ideal
description: An adult tiefling, who is endlessly fascinated by gnome culture and comes from a city no one else has ever heard of. She is restless and modest, and has found work as a ghost hunter.

name: Cristina Sawyer
description: A young adult human, who flirts relentlessly and comes from the inner slums of a large city. She is loud and dramatic, and has found work as a royal taster.

name: Sail Snap
description: An adult kenku, who is the party's biggest critic and comes from a slave owning city. He is deceitful and pontificating, and has found work as an urchin.

name: Grumproud
description: An adult goblin, who has an irrational fear of halflings and comes from a rundown adventurers guild. He is irreligious and grouchy, and has found work as a barkeep.

name: Proudborgor
description: A young adult goblin, who can't swim and comes from a small island. She is gullible and magnanimous, and has found work as a smuggler.
